polytech.devint.controller

Class Controller<M extends Model,V extends View<M>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • polytech.devint.event.Observable
      • polytech.devint.controller.Controller<M,V>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DevintController

    public abstract class Controller<M extends Model,V extends View<M>>
extends Observable
    Author:
    Loris Friedel

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Controller(M model, InputConfiguration inputConfiguration)
      Create a controller from a unique model and input configuration (see MVC pattern)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addView(V view)
      Add a view to the list of controlled views by the current controller The view will be listened by the controller
      void destroyViews()
      Call the destroy method on all views that are linked to this controller.
      InputConfiguration getInputConfiguration() 
      M getModel() 
      java.util.List<V> getViews() 
      void initViews()
      Call the init method on all views that are linked to this controller.
      void removeView(V view)
      Remove the given view from the list of views controlled by the current controller The removed view will stop being listened by the controller.
      void updateViews()
      Update all active views.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Controller

        public Controller(M model,
                  InputConfiguration inputConfiguration)
        Create a controller from a unique model and input configuration (see MVC pattern)
        Parameters:
        model - model that the controller will control
        inputConfiguration - input configuration the controller is ruled by

    • Method Detail

      • getModel

        public M getModel()
        Returns:
        the model that the controller is controlling for now

      • addView

        public void addView(V view)
        Add a view to the list of controlled views by the current controller The view will be listened by the controller
        Parameters:
        view - view to add to the list of views of the controller

      • removeView

        public void removeView(V view)
        Remove the given view from the list of views controlled by the current controller The removed view will stop being listened by the controller.
        Parameters:
        view - View to be removed.

      • updateViews

        public void updateViews()
        Update all active views.

      • getViews

        public java.util.List<V> getViews()
        Returns:
        All view currently linked to this controller.

      • initViews

        public void initViews()
        Call the init method on all views that are linked to this controller.

      • destroyViews

        public void destroyViews()
        Call the destroy method on all views that are linked to this controller.

        public InputConfiguration getInputConfiguration()
        Returns:
        The input configuration of this controller.
